meanings.definition: The quality of being willing to do favors for others.
meanings.sent1: Her obligingness was evident when she offered to help her friend with homework.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your obligingness in lending me your notes for the exam.
meanings.sent3: His obligingness in carrying her books made her day brighter.
meanings.sent4: The obligingness of the volunteers at the shelter warmed the hearts of those in need.
meanings.sent5: The obligingness of the kind stranger left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.definition: The act of accommodating or assisting others.
meanings.sent1: The obligingness of the hotel staff made our stay comfortable and enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: She showed her obligingness by helping her elderly neighbor carry groceries.
meanings.sent3: The obligingness of the waiter in fulfilling our special requests was commendable.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, the obligingness of neighbors coming together is truly heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The obligingness of the team members ensured the project's success.
